news.title: Don't ban non-polluting infrastructure work, say NCR builders
news.para: As per the revised graded response action plan (GRAP) for the NCR, if the air quality turns "severe" (stage III), authorities will have to enforce a ban on construction and demolition activities in the region.

news.title: Inquire into cop probe against Karam Infrastructure: Bombay HC to DGP
news.para: The HC said it is informed that "there are almost 11,500 persons who have been duped in a systematic planned manner by the company, namely, Karam Infrastructure Private Limited, and its directors."

news.title: Ghaziabad: Home to 3,500 families, but Bharat City township lacks a wall
news.para: Earlier, GDA had issued a letter to the builder stating the necessary work such as the construction of boundary wall, provision of covered car parking and other basic facilities be completed by October 20.

news.title: Gurugram: Chintels Paradiso flat owners protest for being forced to vacate their homes
news.para: They pointed out that they are in a doldrum over the last one and half year mainly because of poor construction quality material and sheer negligence on part of the DTCP, which granted OC to the unsafe building.

news.title: Hi-Tech Pipes' net profit increases by 31.17% in Q2 FY24
news.para: Hi-Tech Pipes' net consolidated total income stood at Rs 746.72 crore in Q2 FY24, a growth of 16.23 per cent from Rs 642.44 crore it recorded in the similar quarter last year.

news.title: Delhi government digitises land records to make property sales safe
news.para: Before going ahead with any property deal, people can now go to the portal and check if the said land or building has not been marked disputed or "booked" for demolition activity by the Municipal Corporation of Delhi (MCD) or if it falls in any other prohibited category.

news.title: Drive to demolish illegal buildings in Kolkata starts from October 30
news.para: According to a KMC buildings department official, taking advantage of the festivities, a section of real estate promoters has indulged in construction of illegal buildings.

news.title: Amid boom in illegal farmhouses, trees vanish from Aravali land
news.para: The region in Sohna is designated 'gair mumkin pahar' (uncultivable hill), which is notified under Section 4 of the Punjab Land Preservation Act (PLPA) that prohibits chopping of trees without permission.

news.title: Ludhiana civic body demolishes illegal colony again after its owner resumes construction
news.para: Assistant town planner (ATP - Zone B) Harvinder Singh Honey said that drives are being organised against illegal constructions on the directions of MC commissioner Sandeep Rishi.

news.title: Construction workers' registration progresses at slow pace, only 14 lakh sign up in Maharashtra
news.para: Officials attributed the poor enrolment to lack of required documents, making unregistered workers and their family members ineligible for various welfare schemes.

news.title: Mohali: Gmada e-auction postponed as Punjab chief secretary raises objection
news.para: All the properties being offered were located in developed sectors/urban estates. The sites were planned to be allotted on receiving 10% payment of the final bid price.

news.title: Jamshedpur: Buildings near Subernarekha, Dalma violating green rules to face action
news.para: Deputy commissioner (DC) Manjunath Bhajantri said those responsible for constructions within the eco-sensitive zone (ESZ) in violation of the National Green Tribunal (NGT) guidelines will face action.

news.title: Bengaluru: HRBR Layout residents demand cancellation of licences to illegal buildings
news.para: While apartments should be ideally 5300 sq ft, minimum apartments for less than that are being built. Some of the apartments have more than three floors, and commercial buildings have no parking spaces, he added.

news.title: Ahmedabad: About 28 construction sites sealed for violating air pollution rules
news.para: The civic body had sealed 41 construction sites in the city on Thursday for non-compliance with air pollution guidelines. This action was initiated in response to a circular issued by the Ahmedabad Municipal Corporation on April 17.

news.title: CBRE cuts profit forecast as high rates hurt property market
news.para: CBRE now expects core profit per share to fall by mid-30% in 2023, compared with its previous forecast of a 20-25% decline.

news.title: Mumbai AQI: Construction dust to blame for chronic bad air spots
news.para: For instance, in Andheri (West), residents of the 12-story Chitralekha Heritage Society are fed up with the daily influx of construction debris-laden trucks into their neighborhood, which they believe is causing severe health problems.

news.title: Act against two projects of Janta Land Promoters: Governor to Punjab CM
news.para: The governor has termed two projects – ‘Super Mega Mixed Use Integrated Industrial Park’ and ‘Galaxy Heights’ by Janta Land Promoters Limited (JLPL) in violation of the Centre’s environmental regulations, as observed by MoEFCC.
